Class President's and Masochism Girl's Yuri

description.en: A 4 page shot about girls reading manga at the beach.

altTitles.ja: 九龍通学路

description.en:
A silent manga of a high school girl in Kowloon running on her way to school.

A girl overslept, and is now in a hurry. Will she be able to come to school on time?

(Source: BOOTH)

---

* Alternative Official Raw - [BOOTH](https://ibsukionsen.booth.pm/items/5285886)
description.ja:
九龍通学路を駆け回る女子高生の漫画風イラスト集。
寝坊して焦る彼女は遅刻せずに登校することが出来るのか?!

title.en: Me Being Searched at the Airport Security Check

altTitles.ja: 空港の手荷物検査で調べられちゃうボク

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuukou no Tenimotsu Kensa de Shiraberarechau Boku

description.en: A short full color story about a young couple imagining their holidays.

title.en: Watashi to Kanojo no Kawaii Koi no Hajime Kata

altTitles.en: How My Cute Girlfriend and I Started a Love Story

altTitles.ja: 私と彼女のかわいい恋のはじめ方
悪党収集員‐西園寺の流儀‐

title.en: Tales of Crestoria: Togabito no Zaika

altTitles.ja: テイルズ・オブ・クレストリア　咎我人の罪歌

description.ja: 貧しいながらも明るい片田舎のダーチア村。正義感溢れる少年・カナタは、村のために飛び回る父の背中を追い、幼なじみのミゼラたちと共に村の役に立とうと奮闘していた。だが行商から父が還った夜、少年の世界は一変する。父はミゼラら孤児たちを引き取る一方、彼らを富裕層に売っていたのだ。動揺するカナタはミゼラを守るため、父を刺し殺してしまう。事件を知った村人たちの"正義"の祈りは、悪人を裁く"執行者"を呼ぶ。圧倒的な力を振るう執行者。追い詰められながらも再び顔を上げた時、少年は血塗られた奇跡をその手に掴む――。

title.en: Fist of the Blue Sky: Regenesis

altTitles.ja: 蒼天の拳 RE:GENESIS
蒼天の拳 リジェネシス

description.en: The year is 1939 and the world is plunged into chaos during the onslaught of WWII. After completing the initiation ritual, the 62nd Successor of Hokuto Shinken, Kasumi Kenshiro, is called upon by the destiny of Hokuto. He embarks on a new journey to the Dutch East Indies (Indonesia) which is crawling with the Dutch Army along with an anonymous user who wields a mysterious fist!

altTitles.en: Leaves of the Deep Blue Tree

altTitles.ja: コンノキコノハ

description.en: Only in autumn when the dead leaves flutter about can Akino meet the mysterious boy who lives inside the deep blue tree.

altTitles.ja: ジュカイ―承認欲求の森―

description.en:
Freelance writer Shunsuke Koshiji went to the Sea of Trees at the foot of Mount Fuji in response to a video streamer's message for help. Upon arrival, he found dozens of other streamers gathered there, their goal being to find a secret cult known as "Jofuku Divine Teaching," who are said to operate in the forest. But that night, something happens...

The Sea of Trees and a dark cult... both will bring out the streamers' ugly true desire of wanting to go viral...

(Source: Nihon Bungeisha)
description.ja:
富士の樹海に潜むとされるカルト教団「徐福神霊教」。
その実態を暴くべく、樹海へと足を踏み入れた動画配信者たちだが…。
自己顕示欲に塗れた彼らを玩ぶように、
死と恐怖が、鬱蒼と茂る樹海で拡散する―。
衝撃の承認欲求サスペンス!!

title.en: Ponkotsu Fuukiiin to Skaato take ga Futekisetsu na JK no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: ポンコツ風紀委員とスカート丈が不適切なＪＫの話

altTitles.en: The Story Between a Dumb Prefect and a High School Girl with an Inappropriate Skirt Length
Story of the Useless Prefect and the High School Girl with an Inappropriate Skirt Length

altTitles.zh: 根筋的風紀委員與裙長不當的JK

altTitles.id: Kisah Antara Komite Lugu dan Gadis SMA dengan Rok yang Terlalu Pendek

altTitles.pt-br: A História Entre um Monitor Burro e uma Colegial com a Saia em um Cumprimento Inadequado

altTitles.vi: Câu chuyện về cậu ủy viên ngốc nghếch và cô bạn gái có độ dài váy quá ngắn

description.en: Sakuradaimon is the school's prefect. A prefect is a student who is authorized to enforce discipline. As a prefect, he's supposed to be a role model to other students, but unfortunately he's not perfect. Kohinata is one of the people who Sakuradaimon has tried to discipline into wearing appropriate school attire, but she has thus far been disobedient.
description.ja: 度が過ぎるほど“マジメ”な風紀委員・桜大門くんの日々の役目は、校門当番として生徒たちの服装をチェックすること。彼がいつも注意するのは、髪の毛が明るくミニスカートな“問題児”小日向さん。口うるさい桜大門くんを嫌がる彼女だったが、彼が実はかなりの“ポンコツ”であることを知ってしまい…！？
description.pt-br: Sakuradaimon é o monitor do colégio; um monitor é um aluno que é pode aplicar atos disciplinatórios. Como monitor ele deve ser um aluno modelo para os outros estudantes, mas infelizmente ele não é perfeito. Kohinata é uma das estudantes que o Sakuradaimon tenta disciplinar devido ao uso incorreto do uniforme escolar, mas até o presente momento ela foi desobediente. Esta é a história entre a interação entre os dois.

title.ja: Silent Witch Chinmoku no Majo no Kakushigoto

altTitles.ja: サイレント・ウィッチ 沈黙の魔女の隠しごと

description.en:
Monica Everett is revered as “The Silent Witch.” She’s the only magician in the world who can use magic without an incantation... In reality though, she’s just shy— the only reason she practiced chantless magic was so that she wouldn't have to speak in public! Before even realizing her own talent, Monica is chosen as one of the “Seven Sages,” and is assigned the secret mission of protecting the kingdom’s second prince...?

The antisocial young prodigy will have to hide her true nature while secretly rescuing the prince from encroaching danger in this thrilling fantasy story!
description.es:
Monica Everett es venerada como «La Bruja Silenciosa». Es la única maga del mundo que puede usar la magia sin conjuros... En realidad, es tímida: ¡la única razón por la que practicaba magia sin encantamientos era para no tener que hablar en público! Antes incluso de darse cuenta de su propio talento, Mónica es elegida como uno de los «Siete Sabios», ¿y se le asigna la misión secreta de proteger al segundo príncipe del reino...?

La antisocial joven prodigio tendrá que ocultar su verdadera naturaleza mientras rescata en secreto al príncipe del peligro que la acecha en esta emocionante historia de fantasía.
description.id: Keajaiban tidak membutuhkan nyanyian. Ini adalah kisah tentang penyihir terlemah, paling pemalu, namun terkuat, dan bagaimana dia dilahirkan kembali, semuanya menjadi sebuah buku. (Penyihir Keheningan) Monica Everett. Satu-satunya penyihir di dunia yang bisa menggunakan sihir diam (tanpa nyanyian), dan seorang pahlawan muda yang membunuh sendiri naga hitam legendaris itu. Tapi apa sifat aslinya?? Alasan sebenarnya saya berlatih sihir diam adalah agar saya tidak perlu berbicara di depan umum. Ketika Monica terpilih sebagai salah satu dari 7 Watchers, tanpa disadari, dia terpaksa mengambil misi rahasia untuk melindungi pangeran kedua…? Lemah dan pemalu, namun yang terkuat. Penyihir surgawi yang antisosial menyembunyikan identitas aslinya dan diam-diam membawa kejahatan ke pengadilan melawan pangeran dalam fantasi yang menyakitkan! Fantasi penyihir web, terlahir kembali menjadi sebuah buku, dengan tambahan! Apa yang akan menjadi misteri baru yang berdiri di depan Monica Everett…?

altTitles.ja: アイツノカノジョ

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.ja:
気になるあの娘は、”親友の”彼女。

始まりの季節、春。主人公・リクの家を訪れた美少女・雫は「いいよ、何しても。」と、リクを誘う。しかし雫は、“親友（アイツ）の彼女”。
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

title.en: The Main Heroines Are Trying to Kill Me

altTitles.ja: 勇者ですが、ヒロインたちに命を狙われています

description.en:
Frey Raon Starlight was the hero who killed his family and comrades and destroyed the world. His goal was to return to the past, unlock a "hidden route" to truly save the world, and achieve peace.

As planned, he successfully returns to the past and gains access to the hidden route. However, his relief is short-lived as he is confronted with an unexpected truth: the five heroines he killed in his previous life have retained their memories and are now trying to kill him...!

Can Frey, under such extreme circumstances, save the world this time?

altTitles.ja: 色憑くモノクローム

description.en:
Isshiki falls in love with a maiden who is pure and innocent, but he has been possessed by Asmodeus, the demon of lust. The demon tries to arouse Isshiki by stimulating the sexual desires of the girls around him in every possible way. However, in order to exorcise the demon and avoid the girls' suspicions, Isshiki must never get excited, no matter how lewd they may act!

"How can I stand this...!"
description.ja: 純潔を貫く乙女に恋をした主人公・一色は、よりにもよって色欲の悪魔アスモデウスに憑りつかれてしまった。悪魔はあの手この手で乙女たちの性欲を刺激して一色を興奮させようとしてくる。しかし、乙女に嫌われないためにも悪魔を祓うためにも一色は絶対に興奮してはならない……たとえそれがどんなに淫らな行為だとしても！「こんなの我慢できるわけ……っ！」エロスとピュア、究極のせめぎ合いラブコメ開戦！

altTitles.ja: 十字架のろくにん

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

altTitles.en: Kimagure Orange Road - Digital Colored Comics

altTitles.ja: きまぐれオレンジ★ロード
きまぐれオレンジ☆ロード
きまぐれオレンジロード
きまぐれオレンジ★ロード カラー版

description.en: Secretly-psychic Kyosuke has just settled into a bustling school filled with brand-new faces, but he wastes no time making waves! With both the shy and mysterious Madoka and the high-energy Hikaru spinning in and out of his life, Kyosuke’s dizzy with the first sweet rush of female attention! But will his instincts lead him into the arms (and heart) of the right girl?

altTitles.ja: 放課後ギター

description.en: Psycho Pandas: A oneshot about two teens hiding who they are from the rest of society, one perceived as a genius and the other perceived as a delinquent, and how their true selves come together.

altTitles.th: รักใสๆ ของยอนอู

description.en:
Yeon Woo possesses such a delicate appearance that he could be mistaken as a female student. However, he has a secret crush on the school idol, Kang Haesol. But the shy and timid Yeon Woo has never said a word to her…

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5483716), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=752532)

description.ko:
여학생으로 오해받을 정도로 여리여리한 외모를 가진 연우. 
그는 교내 인기스타인 강해솔을 몰래 좋아하고 있다.
하지만 낯을 굉장히 많이 가리고 소심한 연우는 같은 반인 해솔이에게 말 한 번 붙여본 적 없는데…

"ตอนนี้ผมกำลังแอบรักเธอข้างเดียว"

description.zh:
纯情小白恋上高冷万人迷，
青涩的他能否勇敢追爱？
长相秀气，以至于经常被误认为是女孩子的延禹，正在暗恋同校的万人迷蒋晗抒。然而极其认生，性格怯懦的延禹还从未跟同班的晗抒说过话…在各种同学的助攻下，延禹能否鼓起勇气，勇敢追爱呢？

---

description.pt-br: Yeonwoo possui uma aparência tão delicada que poderia ser confundido com uma aluna. No entanto, ele tem uma paixão secreta pelo ídolo da escola, Kang Haesol. Mas o tímido Yeonwoo nunca disse uma palavra a ela...

title.en: Kiyo in Kyoto: From the Maiko House

altTitles.ja: 舞妓さんちのまかないさん

altTitles.en: The Caterer at the Maiko Manor
The Makanai: Cooking for the Maiko House

description.en:
Within the winding streets of Kyoto's geisha district lives a 16 year old girl named Kiyo. 
After failing to become a Maiko, a traditional dance apprentice, she starts working as caterer for her troupe. 
This is the story of her daily life.  

Published in Indonesian by Elex Media as **Juru Masak Para Maiko**.

Anime: [AniDB](https://anidb.net/anime/15476) | [MAL](https://myanimelist.net/anime/41556/Maiko-san_Chi_no_Makanai-san) | [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=23951) | [LC](https://www.livechart.me/anime/9863) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt13884016/)
Live-action dorama: [Netflix](https://www.netflix.com/title/81325501) | [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/718203-kiyo-in-kyoto) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt15964848/)
 
--- 
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen Manga**
description.ja: ここは京都のど真ん中にある花街。 舞妓さんたちが深夜、お仕事を終えたあと帰ってきて、共同生活を送っているのは、「屋形」と呼ばれるおうちです。 とある屋形で「まかないさん」として舞妓さんたちに毎日の食事を作っているのは、なんと弱冠16歳の少女・キヨ。 彼女がまかないさんになったのには、ある意外な理由があって——。 華やかな花街の舞台裏、普通の日のごはんを通して、温かな人間模様が描かれます。

altTitles.ja: ミザントロープな彼女

description.en:
Hanami Matsudai is awkward when it comes to love and she doesn't know the proper distance for human relationships. You might as well call her a misanthrope. Her peaceful life is disturbed when she meets the unpredictable Ran Ojiya who just won't leave her alone!  
  
The slapstick love comedy of an aloof and love-hating loner girl and a love-crazed handsome stalker begins!

Since the old days, mystical creatures have existed to help humans. However, now that the times have changed, they suddenly receive a warning from their god: "Prove that you are still needed".

While grappling with how they can assist humans in the modern era, these creatures decide to send their younglings to the human world to seek answers.

Meanwhile, university student Park Geuru, who lives his miserable days commuting for five hours to school due to a sudden move, accidentally ends up making a bet with the goblin Sihan... 

This is a story about the daily life of these young mystical creatures, exploring the human world in order to avoid their own extinction.

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

altTitles.ja: ナナイロセカイ

description.en:
1: The Glasses Thief  
A cute story about a boy with bad eyesight and the girl who is in love with him.  
  
2: Convenience Store Honey  
A boy worries about his quiet boyfriend.  
  
3: Adult Uniform  
A girl wonders why her childhood friend does not speak to her anymore.  
  
4: Refrigerator Chocolate  
Satoru is going to have heart surgery with a 50/50 chance of survival. One day, he comes across a girl in a refrigerator…

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal~〈Fan Colored〉

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

description.en: Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

“Punching and making each other bleed. How can you call that a sport?”

Hayul, who had been living a boring and stagnant life, goes through a turning point in her life through her friend Hongmin and coach Sangjun. Mixed Martial Arts, it is a sport that has the memories of her dad, but also the one that led Hayul’s dad into death. Hayul grabs her gloves once again, with a plan to get revenge on Johns Alves, the very person that killed her dad.

“Talent above talents, will Hayul ever be able to break through that wall?”

altTitles.ja: 聖母の断罪

altTitles.vi: Lời tuyên án của Đức Mẹ

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ja: 親子3人で幸せな家庭を築いていた流（ながれ）一家。だが、息子の桐崇は学校でひそかに虐めにあっていた。そして起きてしまったある事件をきっかけに、息子を想う母の愛が暴走していく――。
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

altTitles.ja: おさななじみの百合

title.en: Onna Tomodachi wa Tanomeba Igaito Yarasete Kureru

altTitles.en: My Female Friends Are Surprisingly Willing to Let Me Do It If I Ask For It

altTitles.ja: 女友達は頼めば意外とヤらせてくれる

altTitles.pt-br: Surpreendentemente, minhas amigas estão dispostas a me deixar fazer isso se eu pedir

description.en: Hisaya Minato, a normal high school student, has a female friend who is a bit peculiar. She is Aoi Hatsuki, the most beautiful girl in the high school. For some reason, they get along very well, and since they happen to live on the same floor, they gradually become good friends, coming and going from each other's houses. One day, Minato suddenly asks her to show him her panties. At first, Hatsuki is reluctant, but then she starts to roll up her skirt?
description.ja:
平凡な高校生・湊寿也には可愛すぎる女友達がいる。それは美少女ギャルの葉月葵。何故か気が合う二人は、偶然同じマンションに住んでいることもあって、お互いの家に入り浸るほど仲良くなっていく。そんなある日、湊は勢いで「パンツを見せてほしい」とお願いしてしまう。初めは渋る葉月だったが、恥じらいつつスカートをめくり始めて――！？
 
--- 
 
Heibon'na kōkōsei Minato hisaya ni wa sukoshi kawatta tomodachi ga ita. Sore wa gakkō ichi no bishōjo Hadzuki Aoi. Nazeka kigaau futari wa, gūzen onaji manshon ni sunde iru koto mo ari, jojoni tagai no ie o yukikisuru nakanoii "tomodachi" ni. Son'na aru Ni~Tsu, minato wa ikioi de "pantsu o misete hoshī" to onegai shite shimau. Hajime wa shiburu hadzukidattaga, mizukara sukāto o mekuri hajimete iki ――!?
description.pt-br: Hisaya Minato, um simples estudante do ensino médio, tem uma amiga um tanto peculiar. Aoi Hatsuki, a garota mais linda do ensino médio, por alguma razão, eles se dão muito bem, e por morarem no mesmo andar, gradualmente se tornaram melhores amigos, indo e vindo da casa um do outro. Um dia, Minato de repente pede que ela mostre sua calcinha para ele. De cara, Hatsuki fica relutante, mas então ela começa a levantar sua saia?

altTitles.ja: 双影双書

description.en: Shou, a young boy living in the red light district is suddenly taken to live in the imperial palace. He was selected to become the prince's shadow and act as his shield. In the palace where conspiracies swirl will Shou be able to protect himself and the prince?
description.ja: 遊郭生まれの孤児・宵はある日＂影武者＂として王宮に召し抱えられ、自分と同じ顔のワガママな皇太子・冠星に振り回される毎日を過ごすことに。だが、冠星の不遜な態度の裏には誰にも言えない＂孤独＂と＂使命＂があったーー
description.zh: 在花街柳巷看人脸色吃饭的少年・宵某天突然被皇宫收留。原因是他被选为了皇子那盾牌一般存在的「替身侍卫」，在阴谋重重的皇宫中，宵是否能保卫皇子的安全呢——⁉两名相貌如出一辙的少年相遇后，历史自此发生了巨变‼

title.en: I Don't Feel Like Doing Anything

altTitles.en: I Don't Want To Do Anything

description.en:
One spring day, after the recent death of her mother, Summer decides to quit her stressful city job. She moves to a small beachside town, where she plans to use her entire life savings on two years of doing absolutely nothing. She calculates that she can subsist for this long without finding a job by leading a minimalist, free life. She finds peace and makes friends in her new environment But after a while, the walls of her home are repeatedly vandalized with death threats. Will Summer be able to catch the villain, find normalcy in her life, and make peace with herself?

---

- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=4998319)
description.ko:
26살의 봄, 오늘부터 아무것도 하지 않기로 결심했다

엄마가 그랬다. 
손해 보고 사는 게 편하다고.

엄마 말이 맞다.
그래, 손해 보고 살자.

단, 호구 잡히지 않을 정도만.

이여름, 26세 봄
오늘 회사를 그만뒀다.

---

altTitles.th: ฮานะมารุ อนุบาลเด็กดีนะจะบอกให้

altTitles.ja: はなまる幼稚園

description.en: Anzu goes to a preschool with her friends, the shy Koume and the eccentric Hiiragi. Together, they try to gain Anzu attention from their male caretaker Tsuchida, though he is clearly more interested in the pretty Yamamoto who supervises the class next door.
description.pt-br:
Anzu é uma criança do jardim de infância com uma grande paixão por seu professor Tsuchida, mas Tsuchida claramente prefere Yamamoto, uma jovem professora que lida com a classe ao lado, e Anzu tem suas duas amigas para ajudá-la: a tímida Koume e a excêntrica Hiiragi.

NOTA: Hanamaru é o equivalente à estrela de ouro concedida para as crianças por um bom trabalho na escolas.

title.en: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.ja: 時々ボソッとロシア語でデレる隣のアーリャさん

altTitles.ru: Аля, которая сидит рядом со мной, иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски
Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски

altTitles.vi: Arya-san bàn bên thi thoảng lại trêu ghẹo tôi bằng tiếng Nga

altTitles.zh-hk: 不時輕聲地以俄語遮羞的鄰座艾莉同學

altTitles.id: Alya-san Terkadang Menyembunyikan Perasaannya dalam Bahasa Rusia

altTitles.pt-br: Alya-san geralmente esconde seus sentimentos em russo

altTitles.ne: आल्या कहिलेकाहीँ रूसी भाषामा आफ्नो भावना लुकाउँछिन्

altTitles.de: Alya verbirgt manchmal ihre Gefühle auf Russisch

altTitles.en: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.ja-ro: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

altTitles.mn: Аля Заримдаа Орос Хэлээр Сэтгэлээ Нуудаг

altTitles.ms: Alya yang duduk di sebelah saya terkadang membisikkan kata manis dalam bahasa Rusia
اليا يڠ دودوق دسبله ساي ترکادڠ ممبيسيقکن کات مانيس دالم بهاس روسيا

altTitles.es: Alya a veces me susurra en ruso

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

altTitles.ja: 獄門撫子此処ニ在リ

description.en:
The Gokumon House, a bloodline originating from hell. Within the mystery-filled ancient city of Kyoto stands their citadel; they are feared not only by the seedy underworld of sorcery, but by monsters too.

Gokumon Nadeshiko, a descendant of this cursed family, is fated to devour monsters. A most beautiful girl, born from the flames of cremation; her very being brings about bad omens.

However... "Nadeshiko. I see. You are as lovely as your name." Ichijiku Amana, a most peculiar, mysterious, yet gorgeous woman. Their encounter changed Nadeshiko as Amana faced her with a fearless smile.

An creature lurks in the painted ceiling. Boxes packed with human sacrifice. A twisted curse upon a school. A beast who deceives humans. Haunted by a formless ghost. As the two are faced with one mystery after another, they are ultimately confronted by what they tried to leave behind.

"If it weren't for you, I would've remained an Oni."

An Oni with the heart of a human, and a human burdened with a corrupt soul. The bond that they form will cut the seal on this blood-soaked tale.

altTitles.ja: サーシャちゃんとクラスメイトオタクくん

altTitles.es-la: La chica de secundaria Sasha-chan y su compañero de clases Otaku-kun

altTitles.vi: Bé sơ trung Sasha và thằng bạn Otaku cùng lớp

description.en:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me “Master”!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
description.fr:
Fujiwara est un mangaka amateur, il dessine des mangas érotiques alors qu’il n’est que collégien. Tandis qu'il lisait un porno à l'école, une jolie fille nommée Sasha qui s’avère être très intéressée par ces choses, et lui adresse la parole, elle se met même à l’appeler "Maître" !? 

  C’est l'histoire d'une belle et joyeuse fille qui se porte volontaire pour être mon disciple dans la perversion.
description.ja: 僕は未来の大漫画家にして現えっちな同人誌アシの中学生。学校で同人誌を読んでいたら、えっち方面に興味津々の美少女、サーシャさんから「ししょー」と呼ばれ‥‥!?
description.es-la: Sin importarle el qué dirán y sin temor a caer en lo más bajo de la escala social dentro de la escuela, Otaku-kun no oculta su gran afición por los mangas para adultos, cosa que le hace ganarse el rechazo de su salón apenas en el primer día de clases; sin embargo, Sasha, lejos de sentir aberración por su afición, muestra un interés peculiar, iniciando así una relación... ¡¿mentor-alumna?!

description.en: The two members with the worst relationship in the group are now trending all because of a fan-taken video that suddenly dominated the social media! Young and cute husky X Cool and cold Gege who has great self-restraint?! The shippers are going feral over this pairing! They had clearly never gotten along since their debut, yet they were now forced to embark on an endless path of selling their fake ship together~
description.zh: 队内关系最差的两人，竟因为饭拍视频霸榜热搜！年下小狼狗x清冷禁欲哥哥，CP粉直呼嗑到了！明明出道就不合，却被迫开启漫漫虚假营业路~

altTitles.ja: 大巨蟲列島

altTitles.en: The Even Bigger Island of Giant Insects
The Island of Giant Insects, Die

description.en: New enemies, new bugs and an even bigger island.
description.ja: 辰野神島へと脱出した睦美たちは天空を制圧するトンボに追いつめられる!
description.vi: Mutsumi và những người bạn của cô đã thành công đến được đảo Tatsuno Oshima, nơi mà người dân vẫn đang vui vẻ tổ chức lễ hội... Và rồi đúng như những gì Mutsumi đã đoán trước những con côn trùng khổng lồ đã bắt đầu âm thầm tấn công người dân. Để tránh thảm kịch như các hòn đảo trước thì Mutsumi và các bạn của cô sẽ làm gì đây?

description.en: Park Yun-yeong has a mysterious power which allows her to see ghastly creatures that seem to inhabit our world but not interact with it - unless they notice you acknowledge their existence. That’s when they stop being harmless.
description.pt-br: Park Yun-yeong tem um poder misterioso que permite que ela veja criaturas horríveis que parecem habitar nosso mundo, mas sem interagir com ele, a menos que percebam que você sabe que eles existem. É nesse momento que eles deixam de ser inofensivos.

title.en: Ore no Kurasu ni Wakagaetta Moto Yome ga Iru

altTitles.ja: 俺のクラスに若返った元嫁がいる

altTitles.en: My Ex-Wife is Young Again and She's in my Class

altTitles.ru: Помолодевшая бывшая жена в моём классе

altTitles.es: Mi Ex Esposa es Joven Otra Vez y Está en Mi Clase

altTitles.vi: Có Nhỏ Vợ Cũ Hồi Xuân Trong Lớp Tôi

altTitles.en: I Have A Rejuvenated Ex-wife In My Class
My Ex-Wife Is Young Again And She's In My Class

description.en: On the way home after filing for divorce, Kohei Kurose is hit by a car and is transported back in time to his high school days! Determined to enjoy his new life, he heads back to his high school, only to find his ex-wife, Yuzuka, there...?
description.ja:
妻・柚花との婚姻関係の解消という決断をした航平。離婚届を出したその帰り道、目の前で柚花が自動車に轢かれそうになってしまう。思わず柚花を庇い、航平の命運は尽きたように思えたが――

気付くと、そこは実家のベッドの上。目の前には若返った妹の姿。どうやら轢かれて人生を終えたはずが、高校時代に転生してしまっていた！？二度目の高校生活を送ることになった航平だが、当然クラスには当時のままの姿の元嫁・柚花もいて―― 2人の新たな未来に待つのは、前回とは異なる関係性？それとも夫婦関係の再構築?

altTitles.ja: 幻覚少女がつきまとう話

altTitles.en: A Story About A Hallucinatory Girl Following Me Around

altTitles.vi: Cô gái trong ảo giác của tôi

altTitles.ja: 幻覚少女がつきまとう ハミタの読み切り

altTitles.ja-ro: Genkaku Shoujo ga Tsukimatou - Hamita no Yomikiri

altTitles.en: A Hallucinatory Girl Follows Me Around - Hamita Oneshots

altTitles.cs: Příběh o halucinózní holce co se za mnou slídí

description.en:
A story about being followed around by a girl who appears to be just a hallucination.

---

Note: The original web comic that was released on on Twitter and Pixiv has been compiled on Amazon into 1 ebook volume titled Genkaku Shoujo ga Tsukimatou (幻覚少女がつきまとう) "A Hallucinatory Girl Follows Me Around" and released on March 25, 2024.

* Alternate Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/116706658)

altTitles.ja: メジャー

description.en:
Shigeharu Honda is a Japanese League batter on the rise. His son Goro is a Little League pitcher who one day hopes to follow in his father's footsteps. Momoko Hoshino, Goro's schoolteacher, is the first woman Shigeharu has been interested in since the death of Goro's mother. The destinies of these three individuals will become intertwined as father and son experience both heartbreak and triumph on the baseball diamond. But when an unspeakable tragedy visits the family, it will take everything they have to pick up the pieces and reclaim their dreams.  
  
Won the 41st Shogakukan Manga Award in the Shounen category.

altTitles.ja: ウィンドブレイカー

description.en: Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
description.fr:
Haruka Sakura est le genre de lycéen qui fait passer la baston avant les révisions. Fraîchement débarqué en ville, c'est donc le sourire aux lèvres qu'il compte pousser les portes du lycée Fûrin, l'établissement scolaire au pire taux de délinquance du pays... Les intentions de Haruka sont claires : se mesurer aux meilleurs bagarreurs de ce bahut et devenir le meilleur de tous ! Mais entre-temps, il se retrouve mêlé à une altercation avec une bande de brutes dans un des quartiers de la ville, avant d'être sauvé in extremis par des élèves de son lycée. Haruka réalise alors à quel genre de phénomènes il risque d'avoir affaire...

Maison d'édition FR : Pika
description.ja: 彼らは、最強の不良軍団。そして、街の英雄───。偏差値は最底辺、喧嘩は最強。超不良校として名高い学校・風鈴（ふうりん）高校。この春、そんな風鈴のトップを目指して街にやってきた風鈴高校１年生・桜遥（さくらはるか）は、風鈴高校が“防風鈴（ボウフウリン）”と名付けられた街を守る集団となっていたことを知る。そして桜は、風鈴の一員として街を守るため戦い始めることに──！　不良高校生・桜の喧嘩英雄伝説、開幕!!
description.pt-br: A Fûrin High School ganhou a pior reputação entre as escolas da região por ter a média mais baixa e os alunos mais rebeldes. E nela ingressa Haruka Sakura, um jovem que acaba de chegar na cidade, que busca ser o mais forte para poder proteger todos com quem se importa. Para atingir seu objetivo, porém, a primeira coisa que ele deve fazer é se juntar a uma gangue chamada Wind Breaker, que representa seu instituto e cujo objetivo é defender a cidade de outras gangues e bandidos. No entanto, para que eles o aceitem, ele terá que ganhar o respeito deles com os punhos!

altTitles.en: Don't Mess With the Film Club!

altTitles.ja: 映像研には手を出すな！

altTitles.ja-ro: Eizouken ni wa Te o Dasu na!
Eizouken ni ha Te wo Dasu na!

description.en:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!
___
**Additional Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Anime Twitter](https://twitter.com/Eizouken_anime)
- [Official Anime Website](http://eizouken-anime.com/)
- [Official Live-Action Website](https://eizouken-saikyo.com/)

altTitles.ja: 犬っぽい妹
日替わり尻尾の尾崎ちゃん

description.en: A high school girl, Shiho Ozaki, whose tail grows back every day. Invited by her, a senior who visits the PE storage room almost daily finds himself at her mercy, with her tail, her ears, and whatever else she decides to do.
description.ja: 毎日尻尾が生え変わる女子高生、尾崎詩穂（おざきしほ）。彼女の誘いで毎日のように体育倉庫を訪れる先輩は、今日も尻尾で、耳で、なすがままにされてしまう。

altTitles.es-la: El diario de crianza con el Villano

description.en: Mary didn’t know what to expect of the afterlife, but it certainly wasn’t becoming the evil, murderous nanny of the novel she was reading. Her circumstances become secondary concerns when she realizes that no matter what, Briel must remain safe. It’s the only way to keep his uncle, Count Kentryle Chalant, from the path of revenge. Can she keep her new charge safe and change the entire plot, or will the true villain get the best of them all? And is she going to find love on the way?

title.en: Moushin Listener: Yamiochi Haishinsha ni Koishite

altTitles.ja: 妄信リスナー 闇堕ち配信者に恋して

altTitles.en: Credulous Listener: Loving a Streamer Who Has Fallen to the Dark Side
Moushin Listener: Falling in Love with a Dark Streamer

description.en: A friend stabbed a popular streamer to death. University student Asagiri Hina returns to six months ago to save her friend who went crazy and fell in love with the handsome streamer Ravi. However, Ravi was a scumbag who exploited his fans' affection and sold them to the sex industry. To prevent the tragedy from repeating, Hina decides to break her friend's brainwashing. Can she avoid the tragic end!? A story of desires born from the internet society
description.ja: 親友が人気配信者を刺殺した──。大学生の朝霧陽菜は、イケメン配信者ラビにガチ恋して狂ってしまった親友を救うため、半年前に回帰する。ところがラビはファンの愛情を搾取した末に風俗に売り飛ばすようなクズ男だった。悲劇を繰り返さないため、親友の洗脳を解くと決めた陽菜。果たして悲惨な結末を回避できるのか！？ネット社会が生み出した欲望のストーリー【クレジット】原作：西然実音ネーム・背景：もりもとキャラ線画：sno着彩：FELICO STUDIO CO., LTD.制作：Minto Studio
